snippet: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. To our dearest Bill, we join the chorus of mourners singing your praises. Your energy and old-world charm, tireless devotion, gentle humility and wit, endeared yourself to all who knew you. When you directed your camera our way, we felt special. Well beyond the lens, however was your kindness. Every time you called us "Child", with your twinkling eyes, we loved you even more. We will miss being part of your world. You will forever have a place in our hearts. Alexandra Lebenthal, Somers Farkas, Dayssi Olarte de Kavanos, Muffie Potter Aston 1/3
lead_paragraph: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. To our dearest Bill, we join the chorus of mourners singing your praises. Your energy and old-world charm, tireless devotion, gentle humility and wit, endeared yourself to all who knew you. When you directed your camera our way, we felt special. Well beyond the lens, however was your kindness. Every time you called us "Child", with your twinkling eyes, we loved you even more. We will miss being part of your world. You will forever have a place in our hearts. Alexandra Lebenthal, Somers Farkas, Dayssi Olarte de Kavanos, Muffie Potter Aston 1/3
